name: 😈Hellboarding😇
description:
Have you ever think, what would happen if you were a skateboard? No? I don't care! Play this game!

☀️Summary:

☁️Hellboarding is my third game about a small skateboard that helps a... Trident?

☁️This skateboard is a little bit strange... I don't trust him. Or she?

☀️Game Information:

☁️This game was made for the 70th Mini Jam, with the "Heaven" theme, and "Player is an inanimate object" limitation.

☀️Price:

☁️FREE, Obviously. 💸

Install instructions

--------------------------------------------------------------

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

1. DOWNLOAD THE .RAR ARCHIVE. 📚

2. EXTRACT IT. 📕 📗 📘

3. OPEN THE .EXE ARCHIVE. 📥

PLAY! 🕹

--------------------------------------------------------------
